channel.title: Closing my client
channel.description:
When I close my client, it closes it in the toolbar but the process is still running. It's a .jar file. I need to know where to place the system exit code.
Thank you, I'm using Rune-MTP 634.

item.title: Closing my client
item.dc:creator: @Fridder Fridder
item.description:
@Fridder wrote:

[quote=“AtomicInt_, post:10, topic:415835”]Oops, sorry…

aJframe2.setDefaultCloseOperation(JFrame.EXIT_ON_CLOSE);[/quote]

Holy shit.
Thank you so much man, I really appreciate it.

Read full topic

item.title: Closing my client
item.dc:creator: @Fridder Fridder
item.description:
@Fridder wrote:

launch.java:202: cannot find symbol
symbol  : method exitOnClose()
location: class javax.swing.JFrame
                aJFrame2.exitOnClose();
                        ^

Read full topic

item.title: Closing my client
item.dc:creator: @ExtremeX-Scape Ryley
item.description:
@ExtremeX-Scape wrote:

Enter it in the openFrame void.

item.title: Closing my client
item.dc:creator: @Fridder Fridder
item.description:
@Fridder wrote:

launch.java:

public static void main(String[] arg0) { if (arg0.length > 0) { if (arg0[0].equals("rs")) { rs = true; } } launch l = new launch(); l.doFrame(); }

Here’s the entire launch class:

[code=java]import java.applet.Applet;
import java.awt.BorderLayout;
import java.awt.Dimension;
import java.io.File;
import java.io.FileOutputStream;
import java.net.URL;
import java.util.Properties;
import java.util.zip.GZIPOutputStream;

import javax.swing.JFrame;
import javax.swing.JPanel;

@SuppressWarnings(“serial”)
public class launch extends Applet {

public static boolean rs = false;
public static Properties aProperties1 = new Properties();
public JFrame aJFrame2;
public JPanel aJPanel3 = new JPanel();
public static String ip = "0.0.0.0";

public static void main(String[] arg0) {
	if (arg0.length > 0) {
		if (arg0[0].equals("rs")) {
			rs = true;
		}
	}
	launch l = new launch();
	l.doFrame();
}

public launch() {
	try {

	} catch (Exception e) {
		e.printStackTrace();
	}
}

public void init() {
	doApplet();
}

void doApplet() {
	setParms();
	startClient();
}

void doPanel() {
	setParms();
	aJPanel3.setLayout(new BorderLayout());
	aJPanel3.add(this);
	aJPanel3.setPreferredSize(new Dimension(765, 510));
	startClient();
}

public void doFrame() {
	setParms();
	openFrame();
	startClient(); 
}

void setParms() {
	aProperties1.put("cabbase", "urmom.cab");
	aProperties1.put("java_arguments", "-Xmx102m -Dsun.java2d.noddraw=true");
	aProperties1.put("colourid", "0"); 
	aProperties1.put("worldid", "1");
	aProperties1.put("lobbyid", "1");
	aProperties1.put("lobbyaddress", rs ? "lobby17.runescape.com" : ip);
	aProperties1.put("demoid", "0");
	aProperties1.put("demoaddress", "");
	aProperties1.put("modewhere", "0"); 
	aProperties1.put("modewhat", "0");
	aProperties1.put("lang", "0");
	aProperties1.put("objecttag", "0");
	aProperties1.put("js", "1");
	aProperties1.put("game", "0");
	aProperties1.put("affid", "0");
	aProperties1.put("advert", "1");
	aProperties1.put("settings", "wwGlrZHF5gJcZl7tf7KSRh0MZLhiU0gI0xDX6DwZ-Qk");
	aProperties1.put("country", "0");
	aProperties1.put("haveie6", "0");
	aProperties1.put("havefirefox", "1");
	aProperties1.put("cookieprefix", "");
	aProperties1.put("cookiehost", ".runescape.com");
	aProperties1.put("cachesubdirid", "0");
	aProperties1.put("crashurl", "");
	aProperties1.put("unsignedurl", "");
	aProperties1.put("sitesettings_member", "1");
	aProperties1.put("frombilling", "false");
	aProperties1.put("sskey", "");
	aProperties1.put("force64mb", "false");
	aProperties1.put("worldflags", "8");
}

void openFrame() {
	aJFrame2 = new JFrame("Jagex");
	aJFrame2.setLayout(new BorderLayout());
	aJPanel3.setLayout(new BorderLayout());
	aJPanel3.add(this);
	aJPanel3.setPreferredSize(new Dimension(765, 510));
	aJFrame2.getContentPane().add(aJPanel3, "Center");
	aJFrame2.pack();
	aJFrame2.setVisible(true);
}



void startClient() {
	try {
		client var_client = new client();
		client.provideLoaderApplet(this);
		var_client.init();
		var_client.start();
	} catch (Exception e) {
		e.printStackTrace();
	}
}

public String getParameter(String arg0) {
	return (String) aProperties1.get(arg0);
}

public URL getDocumentBase() {
	return getCodeBase();
}

public URL getCodeBase() {
	URL url;
	try {
		if (rs) {
			url = new URL("http://world16.runescape.com");
		} else {
			url = new URL("http://0.0.0.0");
		}
	} catch (Exception exception) {
		exception.printStackTrace();
		return null;
	}
	return url;
}

}[/code]
